overview: Far up in the rolling hills of sunny California, nine world-class beauties each take their turn at tempting and teasing you with their erotic dances of pleasure. They caress themselves and they caress each other - sometimes gently, sometimes with a ferocious lust. Tantalizingly beautiful in their weakest of moments - when they can deny themselves no more, Breathless, they each give in to their own seductive fantasies of the pleasure from another woman, one kiss, one lick, at a time.
title: Nymphetamine 3
